channel.title: Reviews on Paris Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Reviews on Paris Personal Blog

item.title: Tracking What Goes In
item.description: I noticed that in the past I have not been good about tracking what goes in my mouth.

item.title: Chasing Slow - A Reflection
item.description: I recently finished the book, Chasing Slow, by Erin Loechner. Thoughts of taming lions and running a race were rampant throughout her story.

item.title: One song technique follow up
item.description: I previously challenged myself to play one song when I was getting work done. This is called the one song technique.

item.title: Review: Using Fedora as your Online Course Platform
item.description: Everyone has something that they could share.
